info.name: One sin and hundreds of good deeds
info.narration: -> #0(이)가 작업을 시작하러 '단 한번의 악과 수백가지의 선행'의 방에 들어갑니다
-> 청소 작업이 성공적으로 끝난 것 같네요. 소녀는 풀이 죽은 표정입니다.
info.desc: "Figure is that of a skull with a crown of thorns, attached to a gigantic cross.*It levitates about a meter above the ground.*Despite its harsh appearance, it hardly ever leads an attack.*It often makes noises by clacking its teeth together but there is no need to pay extra attention to that noise.*Stress levels rises rather sluggishly, so less attention is required compared to other Illutionites.*When stressed, ‘feeding’ it is necessary although it does not feed on typical sustenance.*It feeds on human ‘sins’, revealed through confession.*Employee on duty must sit (or stand) in front of the creature and confess to his/her sins.*There is no way to know how it digests words but stress levels do decrease.*When the confession is untrue, there is no telling what may happen."

observe.observe_sub: "Observation Log #4_435" "Of course its eye sockets were empty, it was a skull." "It didn’t mean that it couldn’t see. I can feel its gaze on me, listening." "Letting stuff out in confession did lightened the psychological burden."
